str2: Accusative case of charis as preposition; through favor of, i.e. On account of.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To bend, bow. Apparently a primary verb; to bend.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The knee. Of uncertain affinity; the 'knee'.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
